verses.verse: A good <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>; and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>, than the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3205>one<s%>'s birth.

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> than to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%>: <S%H834>for<s%> that is the <S%H5490>end<s%> of all <S%H120>men<s%>; and the <S%H2416>living<s%> will <S%H5414>lay<s%> it to his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Sorrow <S%H3708><s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H7814>laughter<s%>; for by the <S%H7455>sadness<s%> of the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> is made <S%H3190>glad<s%>.

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%>; but the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8057>mirth<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, than for a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H7892>song<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
For as the <S%H6963>crackling<s%> of <S%H5518>thorns<s%> under a <S%H5518>pot<s%>, so is the <S%H7814>laughter<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool<s%>: this also is <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
Surely <S%H6233>extortion<s%> maketh the wise <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H1984>foolish<s%>; and a <S%H4979>bribe<s%> <S%H6>destroyeth<s%> the <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.

Better <S%H2896><s%> is the <S%H319>end<s%> of a <S%H1697>thing<s%> than the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> <S%H750>thereof<s%>; and the patient in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Be not <S%H926>hasty<s%> in thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to be <S%H3707>angry<s%>; for <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5117>resteth<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> not <S%H7223>thou<s%>, What is the cause that the former <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H7592>these<s%>? for thou dost not inquire wisely concerning <S%H2451>this<s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is as <S%H2896>good<s%> as an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; <S%H3148>yea<s%>, more excellent is it for them that <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.

For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H6738>defence<s%>, even as <S%H3701>money<s%> is a <S%H6738>defence<s%>; but the <S%H3504>excellency<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H2451>is<s%>, that wisdom preserveth the <S%H2421>life<s%> of him that hath <S%H1167>it<s%>.
Consider <S%H7200><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: for who <S%H3201>can<s%> make that <S%H8626>straight<s%>, which he hath made <S%H5791>crooked<s%>?

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> be <S%H2896>joyful<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%>; <S%H430>yea<s%>, God hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the one side by <S%H5980>side<s%> with the <S%H1700>other<s%>, to the end that <S%H120>man<s%> should not <S%H4672>find<s%> out <S%H3972>anything<s%> that shall be after <S%H310>him<s%>.

All this have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> in my <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1892>vanity<s%>: there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man that <S%H6>perisheth<s%> in his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and there is a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man that <S%H748>prolongeth<s%> his life in his <S%H7451>evil-doing<s%>.
Be not <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7235>overmuch<s%>; neither make <S%H3148>thyself<s%> <S%H2449>overwise<s%>: why shouldest thou destroy <S%H8074>thyself<s%>?
Be not <S%H7235>overmuch<s%> <S%H7561>wicked<s%>, neither be thou <S%H5530>foolish<s%>: why shouldest thou <S%H4191>die<s%> before thy <S%H6256>time<s%>?

It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that thou shouldest take <S%H270>hold<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%>; <S%H3240>yea<s%>, also from that withdraw not thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for he that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall come forth from them <S%H3318>all<s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is a <S%H5810>strength<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man more than <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7989>rulers<s%> that are in a <S%H5892>city<s%>.
Surely there is not a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>, that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, and sinneth <S%H2398>not<s%>.
Also <S%H5414>take<s%> not <S%H3820>heed<s%> unto all <S%H1697>words<s%> that are <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, lest thou <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> curse <S%H7043>thee<s%>;
for <S%H6471>oftentimes<s%> also thine own <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> that thou thyself likewise hast <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H312>others<s%>.
All <S%H2090>this<s%> have I <S%H5254>proved<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will be <S%H2449>wise<s%>; but it was far from <S%H7350>me<s%>.
That which <S%H7350>is<s%>, is far off and exceeding <S%H6013>deep<s%>; who can find it <S%H4672>out<s%>?

I <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3820>about<s%>, and my heart was set to <S%H3045>know<s%> and to <S%H8446>search<s%> <S%H1245>out<s%>, and to seek <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and the <S%H2808>reason<s%> of <S%H3045>things<s%>, and to know that <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is <S%H3689>folly<s%>, and that <S%H5531>foolishness<s%> is <S%H1947>madness<s%>.

And I <S%H4672>find<s%> more <S%H4751>bitter<s%> than <S%H4194>death<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H4685>snares<s%> and <S%H2764>nets<s%>, and whose <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H612>bands<s%>: whoso <S%H2896>pleaseth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape<s%> from <S%H2398>her<s%>; but the sinner shall be taken by <S%H3920>her<s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, this have I <S%H4672>found<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H6953>Preacher<s%>, laying <S%H259>one<s%> thing to <S%H259>another<s%>, to find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H2808>account<s%>;

which my <S%H5315>soul<s%> still <S%H1245>seeketh<s%>, but I have not <S%H4672>found<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among a <S%H505>thousand<s%> have I <S%H4672>found<s%>; but a <S%H802>woman<s%> among all those have I not <S%H4672>found<s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, this <S%H905>only<s%> have I <S%H4672>found<s%>: that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3477>upright<s%>; but they have sought <S%H1245>out<s%> <S%H120>many<s%> <S%H2810>inventions<s%>.
